LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.minor_pain.label: minor pain
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.minor_pain.descrip: The pain grounds me. I appreciate it.
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.serious_pain.label: serious pain
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.serious_pain.descr: The pain cleanses me. I like it.
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.intense_pain.label: intense pain
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.intense_pain.descr: The pain purifies me. I need it!
LanguageData.Pain_Idealized.stages.mindshattering_pai: The pain makes me sublime! I wish to become it!
